backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing competitions, user profiles, results, payments, and admin authorization with sorting helpers and state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script converting old user profiles to include new country and gender fields while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or documentation generation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Utility normalizing backend error messages into readable UI strings.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Central list of React Query keys for competitions, results, profiles, and leaderboards.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry configuring routing, theme, queries, and profile setup triggering.
UI guard that checks admin status and blocks access with an error screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query-cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Checks Internet Identity auth state and either shows loading, login prompt, or renders children.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a competition preview card with status, dates, participant limit, and navigation to the competition page.
Renders the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and special handling for solve flow routes.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Builds a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitors, Ao5, and formatted attempt times using profile data.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows a profile button and dialog allowing users to edit and save display name, country, gender, and view MCubes ID.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a setup dialog for new users to enter email and display name, then creates their profile.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Manages the inspection countdown with penalties and reveals scramble before invoking completion callback.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a post-solve screen with navigation buttons to the leaderboard or competition page.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Provides a start/stop solve timer with formatted display and onComplete callback.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Defines test-mode Razorpay configuration values for payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload browser warning when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user’s profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and identity loading.
Blocks browser navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user, competition, results, and admin actions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Computes average-of-five results and defines leaderboard entry structure.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay script and opens payment checkout with configured options.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds or returns DNF.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Admin form for creating competitions with events, scrambles, fees, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, event selection, payment flow, and starting logic.
Fetches and displays competitions grouped by status with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows leaderboard for a competition event, fetching profiles and handling loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages inspection, solve timing, attempt submission, and navigation protection for solving.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event constants, labels, list of all events, and default event.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, including session-backed storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a full‑stack speedcubing competition platform.
